text:
Kurampala is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala state,India.
Language.
Malayalam is the native language of Kurampala.
Politics.
Kurampala is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency.
Demographics.
India census, Kurampala had a population of 20,098 with 9,591 males and 10,507 females.
Weather.
The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year.
Transportation.
The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC).
